data.title: International Partnerships
data.text:
American University is committed to fostering global connections and collaboration, providing our students and faculty with a truly international education experience. Through strategic partnerships with institutions and organizations worldwide, we aim to expand horizons, facilitate cultural exchanges, and drive innovative research.

Our International Partners

At AU, we have cultivated a diverse network of international partners. These partnerships enable us to create meaningful opportunities for our community, whether you're a student looking to study abroad, a researcher seeking collaboration, or an organization interested in joint initiatives. Explore the list of our partner institutions to discover the vast world of opportunities that await you.

Why Choose American University for International Collaborations?

We are Change Makers: Since 1893 our mission has been to advance knowledge, foster intellectual curiosity, build community, and empower lives of purpose, service, and leadership.

Global Perspective: Our university embraces a global mindset, fostering a multicultural environment that promotes diversity, inclusion, and a broadened worldview.

Academic Excellence: We are dedicated to providing an exceptional education. By partnering with renowned institutions worldwide, we ensure that our students receive the highest quality of education and research opportunities.

Study Abroad Programs: 60% of our undergraduate students go abroad during their studies. With 100 programs operating in 33 countries, our international partnership network allows us to bring AU Abroad and the world to AU.

Opportunities for International Students

We offer a wide range of opportunities for international students from our Partner Universities to come and study at AU:

Pathway and Dual Degree programs

AU Rome

O.P. Jindal Global (Deemed) University (JGU)

The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen

Study Abroad: Explore the world while earning credits towards your degree.

English Language Training Academy: Prepare for your academic or professional goals.

Global Research: Collaborate with international peers on research projects.

Collaboration for Faculty and Researchers

Our faculty and researchers have access to a wealth of global collaborations, from joint research projects to partnerships that facilitate academic exchange. Expand your academic horizons and contribute to global knowledge through our international connections.

Get Started

Whether you're a current student, faculty member, or a prospective partner, American University's international partnerships open doors to a world of possibilities.

We invite you to connect with us and join us in our mission to create a more interconnected, globally aware, and collaborative academic community. Contact our international office for more information and guidance on how you can participate in these exciting opportunities.
